name: Nayeem Ashraf
bio: Chef Nayeem Ashraf is a Bangladeshi chef who has worked in several five-star hotels in Bangladesh and abroad.

name: Babul Khan
bio: Owner of Babul's Kitchen, a popular Bangladeshi restaurant in Dhaka that serves traditional and fusion Bangladeshi dishes.

name: Mohammed Ali
bio: Swedish-Bangladeshi chef and television personality known for his Scandinavian-Bangladeshi fusion cuisine.

name: Manik Miah
bio: Known for his 'Ghoroa Ranna' style of cooking, Chef Nazir Hossain is a popular Bangladeshi chef who has been cooking for over 50 years.

name: Feroze Khan
bio: Famous Bangladeshi chef and author of several cookbooks that highlight traditional Bangladeshi cuisine.

name: Asad Latif
bio: Bangladeshi-born British chef, restaurateur, and author known for his contributions to Bangladeshi cuisine in the UK.
